name: Banana Farm
description: Generates bananas that grant cash each round.

name: Merchantman
description: Generates $200 per round. Can be upgraded to boost income.

name: Trade Empire
description: Boosts income of all Merchantmen and increases their profit.

name: Monkeyopolis (9 BRFs)
description: Absorbs nearby Banana Farms to generate massive crate-based income. Produces 10 crates worth 540 each when absorbing nine 4-0-0 Farms.

name: Miniopolis
description: A small Monkeyopolis created by sacrificing one basic Banana Farm. Produces 10 crates worth 120 each.

name: Banna Farm (BRF)
description: A Banana Farm that produces income in crates. Each crate is worth 150.
